        public static int threshold

      • isDifferent

        public static boolean isDifferent(int rgb1,
                                  int rgb2)
        Says if the two pixels equal or not. The rule is the difference between two pixels need to be more then 10%.
        Parameters:
        rgb1 - the RGB value of the Pixel of the Image1.
        rgb2 - the RGB value of the Pixel of the Image2.
        Returns:
        true if they' are difference, false otherwise.
